name: Falmer

aspects.high_concept: Blind Underground Predator - Twisted Snow Elf

stunts: Echolocation: Despite being blind, suffer no penalty in darkness. Automatically detect movement in same zone
Poison Weapons: Weapons are coated with paralytic poison. Successful hits may create 'Slowed' aspect
Underground Ambusher: +2 to Stealth in underground environments, especially Dwemer ruins
notes: The Falmer are corrupted Snow Elves who have been twisted by centuries of underground slavery and exposure to toxic fungi. Though blind, they navigate perfectly using echolocation. They are savage and hostile to all surface dwellers. Often accompanied by Chaurus insects.
combat_tactics: Falmer ambush from darkness, using their superior hearing to locate prey. They attack in coordinated groups and use poison. Some cast magic. They never flee and fight to the death, defending their territory fanatically.
